definitions.definition: A time period of indeterminate length, generally more than one year .
A geochronologic unit of tens to hundreds of millions of years ; a subdivision of an eon , and subdivided into periods .
An indefinite period of time in one’s life characterized by a particular interest.

main_definition: A time period of indeterminate length, generally more than one year .
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) A geochronologic unit of tens to hundreds of millions of years ; a subdivision of an eon , and subdivided into periods .
( informal ) An indefinite period of time in one’s life characterized by a particular interest.
